title: S16 Ep100: TCT:  Dumb Crimes/Stupid Criminals:  Fast Food Felons & Naughty Lovin Edition
itunes:title: TCT:  Dumb Crimes/Stupid Criminals:  Fast Food Felons & Naughty Lovin Edition
description:
True Crime Tuesday presents Dumb Crimes/Stupid Criminals Fast Food Felons & Naughty Lovin Edition

Dave & Tim take a longer look at Dumb Crimes and the Stupid Criminals that commit them this week.In a deeper dive we uncover strange love, impatient fast food and liquor store patrons, a series of "Drive-by Hawk" attacks, unusual porn addictions,bizarre auto thefts and more!

For all the best True Crime Books visit: www.DarknessRadio.com/store
